Notes.Text:
This update for poppler fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-56378: out-of-bounds read within JBIG2Bitmap::combine, which can lead to an application crash. (bsc#1234795)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: libpoppler.so in Poppler through 24.12.0 has an out-of-bounds read vulnerability within the JBIG2Bitmap::combine function in JBIG2Stream.cc.
